summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1342, for the improvement of Thirty-ninth Avenue, from East Olive Street to Rose Avenue; Rose Avenue, from Thirty-ninth Avenue to Newport Way; Newport Way, from Rose Avenue to Lake Washington; Fortieth Avenue, form East Olive Street to East Pine Street; and East Pine Street, from Fortieth Avenue to Thirty-ninth Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions, etc, under Ordinance No. 14988 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
